ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Brand_Experience__r.RecordType.Name != 'Club Experience' && NOT ( ISBLANK(EligibleAfricaMiddleEastCountries__c) && ISBLANK(EligibleAmericasCountries__c) && ISBLANK(EligibleEuropeCountries__c) && ISBLANK(EligibleAsiaPacificCountries__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Eligible Countries fields cannot be set when Brand Experience recordType is not “Club Experience”
